recipe.title: Tres Agaves's Margarita
ingredients: 2 ounces tequila made from 100 percent agave, such as Patron, Don Julio, and Corazón
instructions: In glass or small bowl, combine agave nectar and water, and stir until combined. In cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine tequila, agave nectar mixture, and lime juice. Shake vigorously, then strain into old-fashioned glass filled with fresh ice.
